name: EnableIISApplication
description: Remove the app_offline.htm from a file location.
author: pwshliquori

inputs.name: targetType
inputs.label: Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target destination path: UNC path or remote computer local path.

inputs.name: uncPath
inputs.label: UNC Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: UNC path destination path to remove the app_offline.htm file.

inputs.name: computerName
inputs.label: Computer Names:
inputs.helpMarkDown: A comma separated list of remote computers to remove the app_offline.htm file to.

inputs.name: localPath
inputs.label: Local Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Local folder to remove the app_offline.htm file.

inputs.name: userName
inputs.label: Admin Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Administrator username to run on the remote computer.

inputs.name: password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Administrator password to run on the remote computer.

inputs.name: authentication
inputs.label: Authentication
inputs.helpMarkDown: Authentication method to be use to run Invoke-Command. e.g. CredSSP

inputs.name: configurationName
inputs.label: Configuration Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: PSSession Configuration name if using a custom configuration or JEA Constrained Endpoint.
